author: sussman
msg: Work on issue #896 ("perform EOL translation on log messages and propvals").
This change abstracts the eol/keyword translation logic to operate on
svn_stream_t objects instead of apr_file_t objects.
svn_wc_copy_and_translate() now becomes a wrapper around the
abstraction, and we open the way to performing translation on
(svn_wc_translate_stream): new function.  this is the main EOL and
keyword translation logic that used to be the main body of
svn_wc_copy_and_translate, now generalized to operate on streams
(translate_write): lose the path and pool args.  take a stream
(translate_newline): lose the 2 path and pool args.  take a stream
over the massive docstring that once belonged to
(svn_wc_copy_and_translate):  new docstring, now described as a

author: cmpilato
msg: (test_stream_from_string): Expand this to test the writable version

author: cmpilato
msg: Helping sussman with issue #896 by providing a stream-from-string
interface.  He's abstracting out some code that currently reads from a
file.  That code now needs to operate on data from a file or from a
string.  So, of course, it will now read from an svn_stream_t.
New test suite file (with a single test, for now).

author: blair
msg: Sample configuration file for svn_load_dirs.pl -p command line
option, which automatically applies properties to files matching

author: blair
msg: New options and features to svn_load_dirs.pl:
-no_user_input   don't ask yes/no questions and assume yes answer
-svn_password    password to supply to svn commit
If no directories are listed on the command line, then read them
Make the regular expressions from the property configuration table
Hardwire the location of `svn' and use that when calling svn, so it
can be more safely called from a CGI script.
Instead of quiting when a non-file or non-directory is encountered
in the directory being imported, print a message and move on.
Add a signal handler to catch HUP, INT, TERM and PIPE and clean up
Determine the native eol style by writing to a file in the script's
temporary directory, not in the current directory, which may not
Skip importing paths that are not files or directories.
(get_tag_dir): New subroutine to return a tag given the directory
(get_next_load_dir): New subroutine to get the next directory to
load either from the command line or from standard input.  Also
set the username to perform the commit as from standard input if
(set_commit_options): New subroutine to set the --username and
--password command line options for svn commit.
Mention that to see the command line options, run svn_load_dirs.pl with
Add section headers and make the file easier to read.
